common.pressBackToExitApp: Press back again to exit the app

newbieMasterClassScreen.heading: Heartfulness Masterclasses with Daaji
newbieMasterClassScreen.introductionToHeartfulnessDescription: In this video, Daaji, the global guide of Heartfulness, introduces viewers to the four techniques of the Heartfulness practice and to transmission, the energy unique to Heartfulness.
newbieMasterClassScreen.day1Description: In this first masterclass, you will be guided through Heartfulness Relaxation, a technique that promotes physical and mental calm, before learning how to meditate on the source of light in the heart.
newbieMasterClassScreen.day2Description: In this second masterclass, Daaji will intriduce and guide you through the Heartfulness Cleaning technique, a simple rejuvenation method intended to cleanse the mind and to let go of stress and heavy thoughts and emotions
newbieMasterClassScreen.day3Description: In the third and final masterclass, you will learn how heart-based meditation allows you to connect with your innermost self, observe your deepest feelings, and weave your own destiny.
newbieMasterClassScreen.videoLockedError: Masterclass will be available a day after viewing the previous one. Taking one class each day gives you time to practise and internalise what you have learned.
